articles.author: Simon Patterson
articles.title: What was so extraordinary about Martin's Le Mans MotoGP win - The Race
articles.description: There was more to Jorge Martin's victory in the French Grand Prix than just the 25 points that boosted his MotoGP championship lead. It's the manner of his ride - using a strategy that screamed 'bad idea' - that bodes so well
articles.content: MotoGP race victories might at this point be nothing particularly special for now seven-time winner Jorge Martin. But as the Pramac rider continues to establish his credential for a factory ride next… [+3430 chars]
